scenes.action_text: CONSTANTINE by Kevin Brodbin based on the characters appearing in magazines published by DC Comics, Inc. previous revisions by Mark Bomback current revisions by Frank Cappello EARLY PRODUCTION DRAFT November 14, 2002 FADE IN: EXT. ISTANBUL - DUSK Glimpses of an ancient city. Almost motionless against the tide of time. Sea swelled along an endless wall. Billowing silk frozen against the sky. Birds lighting on Byzantine
